item1.name: Eclipse
item1.description:
55 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
8% Omnivamp

  • Ever Rising Moon: Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 1.5 seconds deals an additional 6% max Health physical damage, grants you 15% Move Speed and a (150 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) Shield (100 + 30% bonus Attack Damage for ranged champions) for 2 seconds (8s cooldown, 16s cooldown for ranged champions).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 4% Armor Penetration

item4.name: The Collector
item4.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
12 Lethality
  • Death and Taxes: Dealing damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health executes them. Champion kills grant an additional 25 gold.

item5.name: Boots of Swiftness
item5.description:
60 Move Speed
  • The strength of movement slowing effects is reduced by 25%.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Dark Harvest
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

item0.name: Galeforce
item0.description:
60 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance

Active - Cloudburst: Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination (prioritizing champions). Deals a total of (180 - 220 (based on level) + 45% bonus Attack Damage) magic damage, increased against low Health targets by up to 50% (90s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed

Maxiumum missile damage dealt when enemy Health is below 30%.
Cloudburst's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item3.name: Rapid Firecannon
item3.description:
35% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
7% Move Speed
  • Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
  • Sharpshooter: Your Energized Attack applies 120 bonus magic damage. In addition, Energized attacks gain up to 35% bonus Attack Range.

    Attack Range cannot increase more than 150 units.

item4.name: Stormrazor
item4.description:
40 Attack Damage
15% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
  • Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
  • Paralyze: Your Energized Attack gains 120 bonus magic damage. In addition, Energized Attacks slow enemies by 75% for 0.5 seconds.

item5.name: Plated Steelcaps
item5.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

item2.description:
70 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
  • Perfection: If you have at least 60% Critical Strike Chance, gain 35% Critical Strike Damage.

item3.name: Doran's Blade
item3.description:
8 Attack Damage
80 Health
  • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

item1.name: Essence Reaver
item1.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack deals an additional 100% Base Attack Damage + 40% Bonus Attack Damage physical damage On-Hit and restores 40% of that damage as mana (1.5s cooldown).

item5.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item5.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Fleet Footwork
perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.2 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

item2.name: Executioner's Calling
item2.description:
15 Attack Damage
  • Rend: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.
